title: WATCH: Armed robbers steal cash, liquor from KZN store
text:
Police are on the hunt for four men who were involved in an armed robbery at store in Montclair in KwaZulu Natal on Sunday.

Police are on the hunt for four men who were involved in an armed robbery at a store in Montclair, KwaZulu-Natal (KZN), on Sunday.

KZN police spokesperson Lieutenant Colonel Thulani Zwane said a store clerk was performing her duties at 08:50 when she heard a vehicle revving outside.

Shortly thereafter, four armed men entered the store.

They demanded that she open the till and one of them proceeded to loot it.

“They took [an] undisclosed amount of cash and liquor before fleeing the scene in their getaway vehicle,” Zwane said.

No shots were fired, and no one was injured.

description: Police are on the hunt for four men who were involved in an armed robbery at a store in Montclair, KwaZulu-Natal. Watch.
